sentences.en: Are you adjusted to the NBA pace for good?
sentences.cn: 你很好的适应了NBA的步调了 吗 ?

sentences.en: DJ's NBA Mid - season Awards: Coach of the Year so far?
sentences.cn: DJ的NBA赛季半程荣誉: 目前的年度教练?

sentences.en: Do you think zone defense has come of age in the NBA?
sentences.cn: 你认为NBA防守已经属于区域防守时代 吗 ?

sentences.en: Every NBA player dreams of having their own shoe.
sentences.cn: 大概意思就是每个NBA球员 都梦想拥有自己(签约代言)的球鞋.

sentences.en: I always wanted to play in the NBA, that was my goal.
sentences.cn: 我从小就想有一天能在NBA打球, 那是我的目标.

sentences.en: It was the Spurs third NBA title in the last seven years.
sentences.cn: 它是刺激在最后7年里的第3个NBA冠军.

sentences.en: Michael Jordan was acknowledged as the best basketball player in the NBA.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔.乔丹是公认的前NBA最佳篮球选手.

sentences.en: Michael Jorden surnamed “Flying Trapezist” has stepped out of the NBA.
sentences.cn: “空中飞人”迈克尔乔丹已从NBA中退役了。

sentences.en: NBA teams are allowed to carry 12 active and three inactive players.
sentences.cn: NBA球队可以有12名活跃球员和3名非活跃球员组成.

sentences.en: NBA Titles are ultimately the biggest separator amongst the all - time greats.
sentences.cn: NBA总冠军是最终把历史上伟大球员分开级别的最大因素.

sentences.en: Pippen has won Most Valuable Player honors in NBA All Star Game.
sentences.cn: 皮蓬获得了NBA全明星队最有价值球员的荣誉称号.

sentences.en: So who do you think will win the NBA championships?
sentences.cn: 那么你认为谁能赢得NBA总冠军?

sentences.en: Starters were decided by fan balloting at NBA arenas and electronically.
sentences.cn: 首发球员的名单是由球迷通过NBA球馆和网上投票产生.

sentences.en: The Lakers have a commanding 3 - 1 leak in the best - of - seven NBA Finals.
sentences.cn: 在NBA决赛 的七场比赛中,湖人队已经有三胜一负的傲人成绩.

sentences.en: There's TV coverage of the NBA tournament.
With all of the new faces, this time may be as important to the Rockets as any other team in the NBA.
sentences.cn: 有了所有的这些新面孔，这个时候无论对火箭还是NBA其他球队都是一样的重要。

sentences.en: You invite your friends over to watch an NBA basketball playoff game on TV.
sentences.cn: 你邀请你的朋友来看电视上的NBA篮球决赛.

trans.tran_cn: Narrow-Band Allocation 窄带分配，National Basketball Association 美国职业篮球联赛
trans.tran_en: the American organization which arranges professional basketball games
